text:
ICYMI: #Vaccine hesitancy — people feeling unsure about receiving a vaccine when it becomes available to them — is a serious issue impacting the distribution of #COVID19 vaccines in the US. 

In a new episode of our podcast, @umichsph experts explore: https://t.co/1RK7KsYE6H ⬅️ https://t.co/ANDbQ8JQJT
